data.title: Top 12 Best Private Schools in Cobb County
data.meta_description: Find out the best private schools in Cobb County (2022) with our comprehensive list.
data.text:
Education is very important in our world today and you want your child or children to have the best education possible. Researching schools can be overwhelming. Let this list of the 12 best private schools in Cobb County make it easier for you to decide which school to choose.

1. The Walker School

Address: 700 Cobb Parkway North Marietta, GA 30062

View on Google Map

Phone Number: (770) 427-2689

The Walker School has been named the Best Private School in Cobb County for the last five years consecutively. It is a private, co-ed day school educating in academics, arts and athletics from PK3 right through to Grade 12.

Mission Statement: The Walker School is metro Atlanta's college-preparatory independent school for students in PK3 through 12th grade seeking an engaging educational experience within an intimately scaled, caring and diverse community where opportunities abound and meaningful relationships inspire transformative learning.

2. Mount Paran Christian School

Address: 1275 Stanley Road NW, Kennesaw, GA 30152

View on Google Map

Phone Number: (470) 440-4329

Mount Paran Christian School, located in Kennesaw, Ga provides an excellent private Christian, non-denomination, covenantal, college-preparatory education from preschool age right through to 12th grade. Mount Paran Christian School is ranked as one of the best private schools in the Atlanta area for its commitment to excellence in academics, athletics and the arts.

Mission Statement: Providing academic excellence in a Christ-centered environment, Mount Paran Christian School unites with home and church to prepare servant-leaders to honor God, love others, and walk in Truth.

3. Whitefield Academy Private School

Address: 1 Whitefield Drive SE, Smyrna, GA 30126

View on Google Map

Phone Number: (678) 305-3000

Whitefield Academy is a private school that, through a strong and challenging academic curriculum with an excellent balance of athletics and arts for all ages, strives to encourage students to engage in critical thinking, practice service to others and have a life-long passion for learning.

Mission Statement: Whitefield Academy, a Christ-centered college preparatory school, exists to bolster Christian families in rearing young people who go on to college and life with a passion for learning, for others ahead of self, and for the living active Jesus.

4. North Cobb Christian School

Address: 4500 Eagle Drive, Kennesaw, GA 30144

View on Google Map

Phone Number: (770) 975-0252

North Cobb Christian School is a coeducational private day school to nearly 1000 students from K3 through 12th grade located in Kennesaw, GA providing a biblically-based academically excellent well rounded education. North Cobb Christian School endeavors to be more than just a school, valuing each and every student’s unique genius.

Mission Statement: Committed to Jesus Christ, North Cobb Christian School provides a biblically-based, academically excellent education in a nurturing environment, developing students’ potential to impact their world for Christ.

5. Cumberland Christian Academy

Address: 2356 Clay Road SW, Austell, GA 30106

View on Google Map

Phone Number: (678) 426-1600

Cumberland Christian Academy is ranked as one of the best K3-12th Grade private non-denominational Christian schools serving Cobb and surrounding counties.

Cumberland Christian Academy is praised for its team of committed educators who strive to implement the 4 C’s of today’s modern educational practices: critical thinking, communication, collaboration and creativity.

Mission Statement: Our mission is to offer Christ-centered instruction that will transform each student’s heart, soul and mind. (Matthew 22:37)

6. Praise Academy

Address: 4052 Hiram Lithia Springs Road SW, Powder Springs, GA 30127

View on Google Map

Phone Number: (770) 943-2484

Praise Christian Academy is a Christian school for grades K 3 - 12 that believes students should learn with excellence, live with character and love like Christ and partners with Christian parents who seek to prepare children both academically and spiritually.

Mission Statement: Partnering with Christian families to provide a Christ-centered educational system where students can achieve academic excellence, a lifelong commitment to Christ and a passion for success.

7. Shiloh Hills Christian School

Address: 260 Hawkins Store Rd. NE, Kennesaw, GA 30144

View on Google Map

Phone Number: (770) 926-7729

Shiloh Hills Christian School in Kennesaw, GA is rated as an above average, private Christian School teaching grades PK, K-12 and prides itself in having a teacher ratio of 8-1.

Mission Statement: Shiloh Hills Christian School seeks to provide, in a living and safe environment, balanced and quality education with a Christian emphasis in academics, fine arts, and athletics. Its foundation is the Word of God.

8. Riverstone Montessori Academy

Address: 455 Casteel Road, Marietta, GA 30064

View on Google Map

Phone Number: (704) 422-9194

Rated as one of the best Private schools in the Atlanta area, Riverstone Montessori Academy provides a truly unique approach to education that provides for all types of learning abilities from remedial to advanced. Riverstone Montessori Academy offers Cobb County the most advanced, truly individualized academic program starting in preschool and carrying through to grade 9.

9. The Sae School

Address: 6688 Mableton Parkway SE, Mableton, GA

View on Google Map

Phone Number: (678) 239-3200

The Sae School is Nonsectarian and serves 320 students in grades PreK - 12. The student: teacher ratio is 6:1.

Purpose: To discover, nurture, and protect each child’s individual life and academic journey. This is what separates the SAE School from other schools. We have committed to this purpose and we are intentional about carrying it out.

10. Johnson Ferry Christian Academy

Address: 955 Johnson Ferry Rd., Marietta, GA 30068

View on Google Map

Phone Number: (678) 784-5231

Johnson Ferry Christian Academy is a private, coeducational hybrid program serving students in grades K-12 offering a small classroom learning environment.

Goal: To prepare students for a life academically, spiritually and relationally in a vibrant community atmosphere.

11. Mt. Bethel Christian Academy

Address: 1385 Lower Roswell Road, Marietta, GA 30068

View on Google Map

Phone Number: (770) 971-02450

Located in Marietta, GA, Mt. Bethel Christian Academy is a Christ-centered school for grades JK - 12 whose goal is to prepare students to succeed in a competitive environment and to develop their unique abilities to the fullest.

Mission: To provide a truly Christ-centered education for our children through an environment that develops and encourages academic excellence, spiritual growth, and a lifelong love and desire for learning.

12. Woods Acres School

Address: 1772 Johnson Ferry Road, Marietta, GA 30062

View on Google Map

Phone Number: (770) 971-1880

Wood Acres is a top-ranked independent school known for its academic excellence in private education for over 50 years from Preschool to Grade 8 in an unparalleled learning environment for students to grow academically, personally and socially.

Goal: The Wood Acres School strives to prepare students to think critically, work collaboratively, problem-solve creatively and express themselves fluently in both English and Spanish.

The schools mentioned above are ranked as the best private schools in Cobb County. Whichever school you choose, you are ensuring your child or children will have one of the best educations offered in the Atlanta area.
